sentences.en: Adjuvant hemithoracic radiation therapy , however, significantly decreased the risk of loco regional recurrence.
sentences.cn: 然而辅助半侧胸阔放疗可以明显降低局部复发的危险.

sentences.en: After that, it became harder and harder to defend in loco parentis.
sentences.cn: 至此之后, 为代替父母辩护变得越来越难.

sentences.en: After that, it became harder and harder to in loco parentis.
sentences.cn: 从此之后, 为“代替父母”辩护变得越来越艰难了.

sentences.en: Click on the loco, and the drivers head appears.
sentences.cn: 点击这个买卖, 和司机的头部出现.

sentences.en: Divine right is the doctrine that the king stands toward his people in loco parentis.
sentences.cn: 神权之义即国王对待人民应如同家人父子.

sentences.en: Flight is the form of loco-motion that puts the greatest demands on muscles.
sentences.cn: 飞行是对肌肉要求最高的运动形式。

sentences.en: From the cab of the little green wheezing loco, the driver waved. I waved back.
sentences.cn: 司机从气喘吁吁的绿色火车头上向我们挥手致意, 我也挥手回礼.

sentences.en: Help to Hamster Loco to impress his girl.
sentences.cn: 帮助仓鼠取悦自己的女孩.

sentences.en: I stand towards her in loco parentis.
sentences.cn: 我对她代尽其父母亲的责任.

sentences.en: The court is acting in loco parent.
sentences.cn: 正以家长地位行为的法院.

sentences.en: The Kentucky high court decided that in loco parentis just by justified that rule.
sentences.cn: 肯塔基高级法院认为代替父母有那样的规则是正当的.

sentences.en: The Kentucky high court decided that in loco parentis justified that rule.
sentences.cn: 肯塔基州高等法院决定让“代替父母”辩护.

sentences.en: The Kentucky high court decided that in loco parentis justify justified that rule.
sentences.cn: 肯塔基州高院裁决让代替父母为该规定辩护.

sentences.en: We had to punish this child in loco parentis.
sentences.cn: 我们必须代替家长来惩罚这个孩子.

sentences.en: Who is that loco kid jumping up and down in the front seat?
sentences.cn: 在前排座位上跳上跳下的那个小孩是谁?

words.tran_cn: 火车头的；运动的；移动的

trans.tran_cn: <俚>发疯的，处于父母般的地位，如父母般
疯草病, 疯子, 火车头
